abstract: Handbag and accessory maker Coach reports quarterly income of $88.1 million, or 32 cents per share, down by more than 50 percent from year-earlier period; also reports that sales fell 15.5 percent, worst decline in last seven quarters.
lead_paragraph: The handbag and accessories maker reported its worst sales decline in seven quarters in North America, raising concerns that the company’s turnaround efforts were failing to gain traction.

headline.main: Falling Sales Undercut Turnaround Effort at Coach
headline.print_headline: Falling Sales Undercut Turnaround Effort at Coach

snippet: The handbag and accessories maker reported its worst sales decline in seven quarters in North America, raising concerns that the company’s turnaround efforts were failing to gain traction.
